resources.string: Click on Image (or LongClick on Item) to select that Item
Scrollable Headers are always displayed at the top of all main items.
When expanded, subItems will be added as headers too.
When expanded, subItems will be added as footers too.
Scrollable Footers are always displayed at the bottom of all main items.
No more items to load. Refresh to retry.
No more items to load (max reached).
An error occurred while loading more items.
... apply the configuration, then, try to filter the list with few and many items.

Tunes the limit after the which the synchronization animations, occurred during updateDataSet and filter operations, are skipped and notifyDataSetChanged() will be called instead.
The limit is checked against the new filtered list.
Waiting time before the search process starts. The time is reset at each new typing.

Rebound the items that remain unfiltered.
If the items have highlighted text, those items must be refreshed in order to change the text back to normal. This happens systematically when searchText is reduced in length by the user.
Notify move of filtered items (Nicely animate the moved items)

Performs a further step to nicely animate the moved items.
The process is very slow on big list of the order of ~3-5000 items and higher, due to the calculation of the correct position for each item to shift. Use with caution!
The slowness is higher when the searchText is cleared out. Try to disable to improve performance.

The demoApp is organized in fragments where the RecyclerView and the Adapter are reinitialized.
Each example implements several features of the library. Common listeners are instead implemented in the MainActivity.
IDLE, SINGLE, MULTI + ActionModeHelper + UndoHelper + Scrollable Headers

The 3 selection modes are managed with the newActionModeHelper.
- You can experiment the MULTI selection starting from the SINGLE and from IDLE mode.
- Screen rotation is also supported.
- ActionMode is implemented in the MainActivity.
Big list with Asynchronous filter and refresh + Synchronization Animations + Configuration

- Items can have common animation for inserting/deletion but some can be unique if AnimatedViewHolder is implemented.
- Index of section items is also provided to give a cascade effect when expanding/collapsing items.
- ScrollingAnimation gives an unique touch of animations when filling the RecyclerView or scrolling it.
Clickable sticky headers for sections + Draggable items with Auto-Linkage + Filter + Scrollable Headers and Footers

- Headers can be displayed and hidden all together.
- Sticky header is a real view and it\'s fully clickable, elevation and transparency are supported too.
- Using filter will disable the sticky header.
- Follow the steps in the Wiki page of the library.

Data Binding Extension Library
Check the code!
Refresh or tap FAB button to update dataset with Data Binding.
Sections with [sticky] headers that can expand/collapse + Draggable items + Filter + Scroll Animations
2 levels of expandable + Selection Coherence + Swipeable & Draggable items + ActionModeHelper + UndoHelper
EndlessScrolling + Drag + Swipe-To-Delete w/rear-views + Scroll Animations + ActionModeHelper + UndoHelper + Scrollable Headers and Footers

1 sticky header for each item + Endless Scrolling.
Internet is required.

A representation of Items holding the model object.
Check the code!

Adapter item holding the model object.
Use can use IHolder interface when you have to serialize/deserialize the model object coming from a network or from a different layer. Check the code!
帮家师傅测试item with edittext
Cards with Sticky Headers disposed in Staggered Layout, dynamic background, insertion and sorting

Easy and predefined method for runtime item insertion and sorting in sections: calculatePositionFor().
- Example of dynamic background with ripple effect without XML configuration.
- You can long press to merge and split items.
Example usage with Sticky Headers in ViewPager layout

Flexible Adapter
